Commands.Aquamarine Waterglint: Water BRV magic attack + HP attackSelf: 2 turns Water DragonOverwrites Thunder TsarChanges BRV Attack to Deluge while Water Dragon active
Commands.Peridot Thunderflash: Thunder BRV magic attack + HP attackSelf: 2 turns Thunder TsarOverwrites Water DragonChanges BRV Attack to Superbolt while Thunder Tsar active
Commands.Sacred Prayer: Moderately restores party's HPParty: Grants BRV based on own MAX BRV; 10 turns Holy Prayer

Artifacts.Break BRV Up: Raises Max BRV by 5% for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Artifacts.Princess's Resolve Boost: Increases the effects of Princess's Resolve by 5%.
Artifacts.Mighty Aquamarine Waterglint: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Aquamarine Waterglint by 10%.
Artifacts.Mighty Peridot Thunderflash: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Peridot Thunderflash by 10%.

Passives.BRV Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Aquamarine Waterglint Light: Slightly reduces action delay after using Aquamarine Waterglint.
Passives.Bonus Up All: Slightly raises Break Bonus gained by the party after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Peridot Thunderflash Light: Slightly reduces action delay after using Peridot Thunderflash.
Passives.Blessing of Alexandria: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after using an AoE.
Passives.Aquamarine Waterglint Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Aquamarine Waterglint.
Passives.Peridot Thunderflash Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Peridot Thunderflash.
Passives.Princess's Resolve: Slightly raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack and Defense if HP is Max when the final battle starts.
Passives.Buff Boost: Largely raises MAX BRV with active buffs
Passives.Aquamarine Waterglint Extension: Aquamarine Waterglint use +1When using Aquamarine Waterglint: Becomes group attack; HP damage shared Becomes 2-hit BRV attack; slightly increased cumulative BRV damageHP Attack becomes Dragon Wave (grants BRV to allies based on HP damage dealt) while Water Dragon active
Passives.Buff Attack Speed: Moderately raises ATK, SPD with active buffs
Passives.Peridot Thunderflash Extension: Peridot Thunderflash use +1When using Peridot Thunderflash: Becomes group attack; HP damage shared Becomes 2-hit BRV attack; moderately increased cumulative BRV damageHP Attack becomes Hammer of Judgment (grants BRV to party based on own ATK + HP attack) while Thunder Tsar active

Weapons.Asura's Rod CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Sacred Prayer.
Weapons.Healing Rod CP: 35: Increases the potency of Peridot Thunderflash.Inflicts Thunder Resistance Down for 4 turns.Grants Small Max BRV Up for 4 turns and extends Thunder Tsar's duration to 4 turns.
Weapons.Stardust Rod CP: 15: Increases the potency of Aquamarine Waterglint.Inflicts Water Resistance Down for 4 turns.Grants BRV Regen to all party members for 4 turns and extends Water Dragon's duration to 4 turns.
